finance.title: Financial Management (Deposit and Withdrawal)
deposit-rules: Depositing funds to a user account constitutes full acceptance of the website's rules and regulations, and after the transaction is completed, it can only be canceled according to the announced conditions.

The user is responsible for the accuracy of the information entered when depositing funds (including the amount, payment gateway, and destination user account) and the website will not be responsible for any user errors.
Deposited funds can only be used to use the website's services and transferring, selling, or converting credit to cash to other persons is not permitted.

Requesting a refund is only possible under special circumstances and after reviewing the financial unit, and if approved, at least 10% of the amount paid will be deducted for tax costs, fees, and accounting matters.
Due to the country's financial and tax laws, in many cases it is not possible to refund funds And the user accepts this by making a deposit.
In the event of any abuse, suspicious activity, violation of laws or unauthorized use of the services, the website is authorized to limit or block the user's access without refund.
The validity of the user account does not expire, but if the account is inactive for a long time or financial policies change, its terms of use may be updated.

All financial transactions are carried out in accordance with the current laws of the Islamic Republic of Iran and are subject to the regulations of the country's regulatory and official payment institutions.
